title: Breaking the Ice
description: Clear the very first stage without tapping any hint buttons.

title: Measured Mind
description: Across your opening three stages, spend no more than two hints in total.

title: Hint Collector
description: Rack up an overall count of five hints used during play.

title: Focused Traveler
description: Arrive at stage five having burned fewer than four hints altogether.

title: Diverse Digger
description: Activate at least one hint in three separate stages.

title: Streak of Insight
description: Finish any three stages back-to-back without a single hint.

title: Inquisitive Analyst
description: Reach a lifetime total of ten hints consumed.

title: Lean Hacker
description: Beat stage ten while your cumulative hint usage remains below six.

title: Hint Connoisseur
description: Sample every available hint category at least once in any stages.

title: Lightning Logic
description: Solve a stage entirely hint-free within the designated fast-clear window.

title: Metro Mapper
description: Complete fifteen stages while keeping total hints used under ten.

title: Quantum Balance
description: From stages five through ten, employ exactly one hint on each and every stage.

title: Pure Path
description: Conquer five stages with absolutely zero hints.

title: Guiding Hand
description: Accumulate a grand total of twenty hints throughout the adventure.

title: Master of Restraint
description: Finish the whole game having spent no more than ten hints altogether.
